items.title: Rapid Processing

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three straightforward steps to process your images in bulk

items.title: Select Images
items.description: Choose multiple images to upload using drag-and-drop or file browsing. Our platform supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: Batch Processing
items.description: Our advanced AI swiftly processes all selected images, applying your specified changes while maintaining high quality.

items.title: Download Results
items.description: Review the processed images, and download them individually or as a zip file for convenience.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Batch Image Processing

items.title: What types of edits can I apply in batch processing?
items.description: You can apply various edits including enhancements, resizing, color adjustments, and more across multiple images at once.

items.title: Is there a limit on the number of images I can process at once?
items.description: Currently, you can process up to 100 images in a single batch, allowing for efficient and bulk editing.

items.title: Can I revert changes made during batch processing?
items.description: Once the processing is complete and you download your images, the changes are final. It's best to keep backups of original files.

items.title: How does WaveSpeed ensure privacy during batch processing?
items.description: All batch processing is done locally in your browser, so none of your images are uploaded or stored anywhere. Your privacy is our priority.

footer.heading: Ready to Simplify Your Image Processing?
footer.description: Try Batch Image Processing with WaveSpeed AI today and experience the time savings. No sign-up required.
